item.title: Finally, a dev kit for designing on-device, mobile AI apps is here: Liquid AI’s LEAP
item.description: LEAP addresses those needs head-on with a local-first approach that allows small models to run directly on-device, no cloud infrastructure.

item.title: Perplexity offers free AI tools to students worldwide in partnership with SheerID
item.description: Perplexity and SheerID launch a global program offering students up to two years of free AI access through secure identity verification.

item.title: Anthropic launches finance-specific Claude with built-in data connectors, higher limits and prompt libraries
item.description: Anthropic is unveiling a financial sector-specific Claude version that will tackle data connectors and added rate limits for analysts.

item.title: Amazon launches Kiro, its own Claude-powered challenger to Windsurf and Codex
item.description: Initial community reactions to Kiro were mixed, but developers were intrigued, praising the emphasis on specs, hooks and structure.

item.title: Remaining Windsurf team and tech acquired by Cognition, makers of Devin: ‘We’re friends with Anthropic again’
item.description: Cognition CEO Scott Wu and interim Windsurf CEO Jeff Wang said they would start by integrating the AI-powered engineer Devin into Windsurf.
